body_html:
So, those test failures are a bad omen. Clearly we cannot assign this return type to an int, specifically, not an int which is a field of a proto. I think this sinks this PR, since that's too common a thing to currently do to be able to break this behavior.

Maybe it's possible to repair by improving automatic conversion. @Mycosynth do you want to give it a try?

body:
So, those test failures are a bad omen. Clearly we cannot assign this return type to an int, specifically, not an int which is a field of a proto. I think this sinks this PR, since that's too common a thing to currently do to be able to break this behavior.

Maybe it's possible to repair by improving automatic conversion. @Mycosynth do you want to give it a try?
